title: How does technology and economy influence the design process? - Quora

response.answer_text: The technology and the economy are some of the main parameters around which the design process is centered. However, there is a lack of clarity in your question. By design, do you mean product design or design thinking process. In either case, both technology and economy play an important, both on the entrepreneur side and on consumer side. These two factors do considerably impact the consumer behavioral pattern, depending on the demographics. Please read my answer on Design Thinking here Shyamsunder Panchavati's answer to What is STEM education? Can we introduce design thinking in it and make D-STEM? How would it benefit the academia and the industry?
